SEARCH
Package bl

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
bl.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
Manages the game logic for the snake game. This class handles the movement of the snake, collisions with food, and game state (win/lose conditions).

      Sets the grid for the game and initializes the game table and food.
      Parameters:

    • updateGameTable

      public void updateGameTable(Direction direction) throws IOException
      Updates the game table based on the current direction of the snake. Handles the movement of the snake and checks for collisions with food.
      Parameters:
      direction - The new direction in which the snake is moving.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • isGameLose

      public boolean isGameLose()
      Checks if the game is lost, which occurs if the snake collides with itself or the walls.
      Returns:
      true if the game is lost, false otherwise.

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Checks if the game is won, which occurs if the snake fills the entire grid.
      Returns:
      true if the game is won, false otherwise.

    • getGrid

      public Grid getGrid()
      Gets the current grid.
      Returns:
      The current grid.

    • getSnakeCells

      public Cell[] getSnakeCells()
      Gets the cells that form the snake.
      Returns:
      An array of cells representing the snake.
